summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2924, for the improvement of Eloise Terrace from Newton Street to McGraw Street, et al, by grading and regrading; by constructing wooden curbs and gutters; by constructing concrete sidewalks with the necessary wooden cross walks and concrete stairways; by providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 35318 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
